channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0683; 11:24AM; 2249 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/463xXoC; #AdamsNormandie; Firefighters made access to the three-story home, and ascended interior stairwells with hose lines. Fire attack crews located fire on the 3rd floor and in the attic, as ventilation crews went to the roof to cut holes for smoke and super-heated gases to escape. Ultimately, it took 47 firefighters 27 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E447 EA1 EM11 RA11 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26 T29; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0683; 10:57AM; 2249 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/463xXoC; #AdamsNormandie; Three-story craftsman home with light light smoke showing. Crews located a fire on the 3rd floor. Offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E447 EM11 RA11 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26 T29; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1359; 07:11PM; 1933 N Lemoyne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PuWSfm; #EchoPark; Firefighters found a three-story descending hillside home with heavy fire on the first floor (middle floor is at grade level). Flames climbed to the second floor, as firefighters made entry with water-charged hose lines. Ultimately, it took 34 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E220 E235 E3 E56 RA56 RA850 SQ21 T20 T35; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1359; 06:48PM; 1933-1/2 N Lemoyne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZbkF7p; #EchoPark; Three-story descending hillside home with heavy smoke showing.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E220 E235 E3 E56 RA56 RA850 SQ21 T20 T35; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0097; 02:04AM; 2241 N Betty Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z6ypQP; #BeverlyCrest; Thirty LAFD Firefighters took just 26 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire involving multiple vehicles within a detached two-story garage adjacent to a 2 story 2,400 square-foot hillside home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E292 E97 E99 RA78 RA878 T78 T92; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0097; 01:38AM; 2241 N Betty Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z6ypQP; #BeverlyCrest; PRELIM: Multiple vehicles ablaze within a two-story detached garage adjacent to a 2 story home. ; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E292 E97 E99 RA78 RA878 T78 T92; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 09/03/2023 INC#1127

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1127; 07:12PM; 5603 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L7TeWd; #Hollywood; During a post-fire assessment of LAFD responders, one of the first-to-arrive LAFD Firefighters involved in the entirety of the firefight was seen to exhibit clinical signs of dehydration. Pursuant to LAFD protocol, he has been taken to an area hospital in fair condition for a detailed clinical assessment. No additional injuries have been reported. The fire's cause remains under active investigation.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E27 E29 E3 E35 E52 E6 E82 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM14 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA29 RA3 RA35 RA41 RA6 RA82 RA829 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 09/03/2023 INC#1127

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1127; 06:20PM; 5603 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L7TeWd; #Hollywood; Though LAFD crews actively assisted several occupants in safely exiting the smoke-charged twenty-unit two-story apartment building during the fire, only two civilian adults required LAFD medical assessment for smoke exposure: A 79 year-old female has been taken to an area hospital in fair condition for further medical assessment. The other patient declined offered ambulance transportation. While the fire was confined to the one upstairs apartment, LAFD personnel are systematically assessing the remaining units to assure residents can be safely and comfortably rehoused. The building was not equipped with optional fire sprinklers. The fire's cause remains under active investigation.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E27 E29 E3 E35 E52 E6 E82 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM14 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA29 RA3 RA35 RA41 RA6 RA82 RA829 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire Knockdown - 09/03/2023 INC#1127

item.description: Update Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1127; 05:51PM; 5603 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L7TeWd; #Hollywood; First arriving 50 LAFD Firefighters took just 27 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within one 2nd floor unit of an 11,100 square foot two story center hallway apartment building (built 1924). Several occupants of the twenty-unit building were actively evacuating on LAFD arrival, and two are being medically evaluated by LAFD Paramedics. The fire's cause is under active investigation.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E27 E29 E3 E35 E52 E6 E82 EM1 EM11 EM14 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA29 RA3 RA35 RA41 RA6 RA82 RA829 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1127; 05:24PM; 5603 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L7TeWd; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Fire and smoke on the second floor of a 11,100 square foot twenty-unit two story center hallway apartment building, with active occupant evacuation.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E27 E29 E3 E35 E52 E6 E82 EM1 EM14 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA29 RA3 RA35 RA41 RA6 RA82 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey
